ygData.subject: Re: Best armor for erudite enchanters?
ygData.msgSnippet: woven is the best we can get, so far... there is other armor available (not counting flowing black robes, etc) that we can wear, but it is harder to get. bone
ygData.messageBody:
woven is the best we can get, so far... there is other armor available (not
counting flowing black robes, etc) that we can wear, but it is harder to
get. bone armor, for one. i would check eqvault and those places frequently
to see the latest armor. but for now, woven will be fine. there is the rare
loser (sorry, this word is childish but appropriate) who buys 2000plat on
ebay and decks himself out in lvl 30 armor and weapons at lvl 8 or so, but
in my opnion, these people dont know what the fun of the game is. (i
apologize if i offend anyone with that statement, but it is how i feel, =)

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 21st lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 03:36 PM 6/10/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>
>
>I currently just have cloth. Is woven armor the best?
>What should I be wearing at level 12?
>
>Azboklin
